Name: Saigon Sling
Ingredients: 2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale
Instructions: SHAKE first seven ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger ale.
History: Created in 2001 by Rodolphe Sorel at the Manor for a London bartending competition.
Nutrition: One serving of Saigon Sling contains 186 calories
